title: My last game says it all about our community RN

replies.body: Find something to practice in game and report them.

That sort of trash often caves if you just calmly notify them that you will report them, and proceed to play as normal, completely ignoring their antics.

Easy way to troll people in lobby with no repercussions.
I was just gonna take Shyv and power farm
Someone else did, but I was prepared to take Imperials route of action.
